title: April school holiday from today
body_lines: Even thought the third term of all government and government-assisted private Sinhala and Tamil schools for the year 2021 would end on Friday (8), the Education Ministry has announced the closure of the said schools from today (6).
Education Ministry Secretary Prof. Kapila Perera said the schools would re-open on April 18 for the next term 2022. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
